title: Looking to trade these for T206 Cubbies
author: milkit1

posts.post_title: Looking to trade these for T206 Cubbies
posts.post_content:
Looking to trade any and all of the cards pictured (plus I have a BUNCH of T206 Sovereigns that im willing to trade for sovereigns of these)) for any of the following T206 Cubs:

Frank Chance - need all except yellow portrait
Joe Tinker - any
Johnny Evers - blue sky and portrait
Mordecai Brown - portrait
Pat Moran
Ed Reulbach - front pose
Carl Lundgren
Rube Kroh
FRANK Schulte - side view
George Browne
Orval Overall - portraitr
Tom needham
James Sheckard
Jack Pfiester - both
Harry Steinfeldt - portrait
Heinie Zimmerman

please email me at [url]milkit1@gmail.com[/url]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=85668&d=1359252677[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=85669&d=1359252691[/IMG]

Sean, 
Love the Evers!
Thanks for the good trade.

Doug
